text_in_pdf:
VACANCIES — SLOVAKIA  

DOCUMENT INFORMATION  

• Document processing takes 2 weeks • “Súhlas” processing takes 1 month and 2 weeks • For document submission you need: – Photo of the first page of your passport – Actual residential address of candidate .  

1. Online Store Warehouse (Senec, Slovakia)  

Job Type: Online store warehouse work  

Responsibilities:   
• Order picking (scanner picking)   
• Packing products   
• Sorting and shelving   
• Other warehouse tasks as instructed by the coordinator  

Conditions: • Modern heated warehouse • Suitable for men and women • Day and night shifts available • Transportation to work: €1/day  

Salary: • €6–€7.8 net per hour  

Accommodation: • Provided in Senec, payment deducted from salary later • Living conditions discussed individually  

2. Postal Warehouse — Parcel Sorting (Bernolákovo, Slovakia)  

Job Type: Logistics warehouse  

Responsibilities:   
• Parcel sorting   
• Working with conveyor and scanner   
• Sorting by directions   
• Keeping workplace clean   
Conditions:   
• Located in Bernolákovo   
• Suitable for men and women   
• Currently needed: 1–2 people for morning shifts   
Schedule:   
• Mostly morning shifts   
• Additional shifts possible during peak season  

Salary: • €6.5 net per hour  

Accommodation: • Available in Senec  

3. Factory & Warehouse — Windshield Production (Slovakia)  

Suitable for: Men  

Responsibilities:   
• Production and processing of windshields   
• Working on the production line   
• Quality control   
• Packing finished products   
• Auxiliary warehouse work  

Forklift Operators (VZV):  

• 1–2 experienced men needed • Electric and diesel forklifts • Supplying materials to production line • Moving pallets with glass  

Conditions:   
• Modern heated warehouse   
• On-site training   
• Stable 3-shift system (6:00–14:00, 14:00–22:00, 22:00–6:00)  

Salary: • Regular workers: from $\in\!6.5$ net per hour • VZV operators: $\in\!8.5$ net per hour  

Accommodation: • Provided if needed in Senec  

4. Metal Warehouse (Slovakia)  

Suitable for: Men  

Responsibilities:  

• Working with metal products   
• Cutting, sorting, preparing metal materials   
• Packing   
• Loading/unloading   
• General warehouse tasks  

Conditions:  

• Indoor work with metal • Stable schedule, day shifts • Basic physical endurance required  

Salary:   
• $\in\!6.5$ net per hour   
• Free accommodation near workplace  

5. Postal Warehouse (Trnava, Slovakia)  

For: Men, women, and couples  

Responsibilities: • Sorting parcels • Order picking  

Location: Trnava Schedule: 2 shifts, extra hours available  

Salary: • €7 per hour
